Title: Crack.NET
Description: A runtime debugging and scripting tool that gives you access to the internals of a WPF or Windows Forms application
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A runtime debugging and scripting tool that gives you access to the internals of a WPF or Windows Forms application



Crack.NET is a runtime debugging and scripting tool that gives you access to the internals of a WPF or Windows Forms application running on your computer. If you love Snoop and Mole for Visual Studio, you’ll love Crack.NET, too. Crack.NET allows you to “walk” the managed heap of another .NET application, and inspect all values on all objects/types. Crack.NET requires the .NET Framework 3.5 with Service Pack 1 (SP1) in order to run.



Once you find an object or type that you're interested in, you can manipulate it, and others, by writing and executing an IronPython script.



If you want to view a type or type member in Red Gate's .NET Reflector, simply right-click on the type or member name of interest and select 'Open in Reflector' from the context menu.





Visit the Crack.NET homepage here: http://cracknetproject.com
